sense.def:
A slur
je žaljiva pripomba, ki lahko uniči sloves nekoga.

seg.quote: He got angry whenever anyone cast the slightest slur on the regiment.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
slurs one's speech
ali kadar govor nekoga
slurs
, kadar človek ne izgovarja besed razločno, pogosto zato, ker je pijan.

seg.quote: ‘I'll sing for you,’ he said, his voice slurring so that he could barely be understood.
His words were slurred and his breath smelled of wine.
